t: Bestselling Littleton Coin Company products on Amazon.com in March 2025

t: Littleton Amazon facility nears completion, 'soft opening' in progress
s: October 8, 2021 - LITTLETON -- Amazon is moving ahead with the opening of its last mile facility at 151-153 Taylor St., after obtaining all necessary town permits and approvals.

t: An Amazon “Last Mile” facility coming to Littleton
s: February 7, 2021 - LITTLETON — Littleton residents will soon have a new neighbor at 151 and 153 Taylor St.: Amazon. The retail giant, whose CEO Jeff Bezos stepped down from his role this week, will move into a new “last mile” warehouse on the site and a vacant office building there will be demolished to ...
